code: import api from'./api';export const getTours=async()=>{const response=await api.get('/admin/tours');return response.data;};export const getBookings=async()=>{const response=await api.get('/admin/bookings');return response.data;};export const getUsers=async()=>{const response=await api.get('/admin/users');return response.data;};export const updateBookingStatus=async(bookingId,status)=>{const response=await api.put("/admin/bookings/".concat(bookingId,"/status"),{status});return response.data;};export const updateUserRole=async(userId,role)=>{const response=await api.put("/admin/users/".concat(userId,"/role"),{role});return response.data;};export const deleteUser=async userId=>{const response=await api.delete("/admin/users/".concat(userId));return response.data;};
